verses.roman:
yāhāṅ yāya, loka uṭhe hari-dhvani kari'
dekhi' ānandita-mana hailā gaurahari

synonyms: yāhāṅ yāya—wherever He goes; loka uṭhe—people stand up; hari-dhvani kari'-vibrating the holy name of the Hare Kṛṣṇa mantra; dekhi'-by seeing; ānandita—happy; mana—in mind; hailā—became; gaurahari—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: Wherever Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went, the holy name of Śrī Hari was vibrated. Seeing this, the Lord became very happy.
